data.text: @FrontBurnerCBC @CBCNews @zchagla Vaccinate ????? LMAO YOU BEST read the pzfizer document dump + get off the corporate news crack.
@FrontBurnerCBC @zchagla This episode is billed as having “good news” which amounts to: there are some drugs now? Opening up isn’t an achievement at all. The world is just giving up.

@FrontBurnerCBC @zchagla For many people, immunity means you can't get Covid-19. We know this isn't true. Our body's immune response is better, but there is no perfect shield for Covid-19. I recommend the CBC stop using the term "immunity" and talk about "improved immune response". #BeClear #Journalism
